data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: It's very important to stay out of the sun in the summer. If ____ spend ____ much ____ outside, you ____ get a sunburn. The ____ makes ____ skin ____ and ____, ____ can ____ your ____ of ____ later ____ life. If you are in the sun, use sunscreen!
data.partBlankContent: It's very important to stay out of the sun in the summer. If y__ spend t__ much ti__ outside, you c__ get a sunburn. The s__ makes yo__ skin d__ and r__, a__ can incr____ your cha____ of prob____ later i_ life. If you are in the sun, use sunscreen!
data.answer: 在夏天远离太阳是很重要的。如果你在户外呆太久，你会被晒伤的。太阳会让你的皮肤变干变红，并且会增加你以后生活中出现问题的几率。如果你在阳光下，使用防晒霜!
